articles.author: Barney Calman
articles.title: NHS rejects ketamine for depression as psychiatrists accuse NICE of mental health discrimination - Daily Mail
articles.description: Spravato (pictured), a nasal spray also known as esketamine, got the green light from the European Medicines Agency in December 2019 as a fast-acting treatment for depression sufferers.
articles.content:
A row has broken out between NHS spending watchdogs and top mental health doctors over approval of a controversial ketamine-based antidepressant.
Spravato, a nasal spray also known as esketamine, go… [+5211 chars]
